price: (Ya’aquub) kaa sε: “Nokorε sε, sε mode no kͻ a mewerε bεho papaapa, na mesuro nso sε anhwε a na pataku bi akͻkye no awe wͻ εberε a moani nni nesoͻ.
arabic: قَالَ إِنِّي لَيَحۡزُنُنِيٓ أَن تَذۡهَبُواْ بِهِۦ وَأَخَافُ أَن يَأۡكُلَهُ ٱلذِّئۡبُ وَأَنتُمۡ عَنۡهُ غَٰفِلُونَ

version.title: Ashanti Translation
version.description: Translation of the Quran meanings into Ashanti by Sheikh Haroun Ismaeel

meta.transliteration: qāla innī layaḥzununī an tadhhabū bihi wa-akhāfu an yakulahu al-dhi'bu wa-antum ʿanhu ghāfilūna
